title: Remove all '0% tax' references from the site

requirements.text: Audit all frontend components (TokenomicsSection, TickerBanner, HeroSection, AboutSection, HowToBuySection, Navigation, CommunitySection, Footer, and any other files) and remove every visible instance of '0% tax', '0 percent tax', '0% buy & sell tax', 'zero tax', or any equivalent phrasing referencing a 0% tax rate. This includes card labels, badge text, ticker phrases, tooltips, and body copy. Do not replace removed text with alternative tax copy â€” simply omit it entirely.

quotes: remove anything on the site that says 0 percent tax

acceptanceCriteria: No visible text on any page section contains '0% tax', '0% buy & sell tax', '0 percent tax', 'zero tax', or any equivalent phrasing.
The TickerBanner marquee contains no tax-related phrases.
The TokenomicsSection contains no tax-related card, badge, or label.
All other components (Hero, About, Navigation, Footer, Community) are free of any 0% tax references.
No layout breakage occurs from removing the text; surrounding elements reflow cleanly.

constraints: Do not introduce any new tax-related copy as a replacement.
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Adding or changing any other tokenomics figures or copy.
Modifying the backend in any way.
Changing any visual theme, layout, or branding unrelated to the tax text removal.
